mods.abstract: Page 43 of the album includes three photographs.; Photograph 1 shows pint baskets of brussels sprouts loaded in a packing crate. A tape measure is used to denote scale.; Photograph 2 shows bushel and pint baskets of brussels sprouts in a packing crate alongside two uprooted brussels sprout plants.; Photograph 3 shows a bushel basket of brussels sprouts with a tape measure used to illustrate scale.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
